doc:
Luci Christian https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luci_Christian 0 Louisa Michelle "Luci" Christian (born March 18, 1973) is an American voice actress and ADR script writer at Funimation and Seraphim Digital/Sentai Filmworks. She has provided many voices for English versions of Japanese anime series and films. Louisa_Michelle_"_Luci_"_Christian ( born March_18_,_1973 ) is an_American_voice_actress_and_ADR_script_writer at Funimation and Seraphim_Digital/Sentai_Filmworks . She has_provided many_voices for English_versions of Japanese_anime_series_and_films .
